# How to Download and Install Everest EWN-789N Driver 15 for Windows
 
If you have an Everest EWN-789N wireless adapter and you want to update its driver to version 15, you can follow these simple steps:

1. Go to [this website](https://treexy.com/products/driver-fusion/database/sound-video-and-game-controllers/everest-semiconductor/esaudriver/) and click on the "Download" button.
2. Save the file to your computer and run it as an administrator.
3. Follow the instructions on the screen to install the driver.
4. Restart your computer and enjoy your wireless connection.

It also has a WPS button that allows you to easily connect to a secure network without entering a password.

- It supports Windows 11, 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, and XP operating systems.

- It supports WEP, WPA, WPA2, and WPS encryption methods to protect your data from unauthorized access.
